attributes.additional_details: Euthanasia is a way of taking your life in a humane way for people who suffer uncontrollably from diseases . They do it wilfully with professionals and respectfully .
attributes.background: People who are suffering in an extremely inhumane way , possibly from terminal illnesses such as cancer etc. Or people who know they wont be able to recover from such diseases deserve the right to have an option to take their life in a humane and respectful way.
